items.title: The Q: Your Destination For Lab Life & Scientific Discovery | Allison ...

items.snippet: Allison Paradise is the CEO and founder of My Green Lab. Under her leadership, My Green Lab has established itself as a pioneer in laboratory sustainability ...
items.htmlSnippet: Allison Paradise is the CEO and founder of My Green Lab. Under her leadership, My Green Lab has established itself as a pioneer in laboratory sustainability ...

metatags.twitter:title: The Q: Your Destination For Lab Life & Scientific Discovery | Allison Paradise
metatags.author: Quartzy Inc.
metatags.twitter:description: Allison Paradise is the CEO and founder of My Green Lab.  Under her leadership, My Green Lab has established itself as a pioneer in laboratory sustainability.  The organization developed the first nationally recognized standard for laboratory operations, established the first ENERGY STAR category for laboratory equipment, and recently released the first eco-label for laboratory products.  Allison regularly speaks at industry meetings and scientific conferences on laboratory sustainability. She holds degrees in neuroscience from Brown and Harvard.
metatags.og:title: The Q: Your Destination For Lab Life & Scientific Discovery | Allison Paradise

metatags.twitter:title: The Q: Your Destination For Lab Life & Scientific Discovery | Marcella Flores
metatags.author: Quartzy Inc.
metatags.twitter:description: A scientist specializing in the HIV cure field, Dr. Marcella Flores leverages her diverse background as an entrepreneur and a strategist at a large non-profit to impact health outcomes in vulnerable populations. As associate director of research at amfAR, the Foundation for AIDS Research, Dr. Flores co-develops the strategy aimed at finding the scientific basis of a cure for HIV by 2020. As founder, president & CEO of The Reagent Project, a STEM focused nonprofit, Dr. Flores directs the programmatic growth and financial development of the organization aimed at leveling the playing field for scientists.
metatags.og:title: The Q: Your Destination For Lab Life & Scientific Discovery | Marcella Flores
metatags.og:description: A scientist specializing in the HIV cure field, Dr. Marcella Flores leverages her diverse background as an entrepreneur and a strategist at a large non-profit to impact health outcomes in vulnerable populations. As founder, president & CEO of The Reagent Project, a STEM focused nonprofit, Dr. Flores directs the programmatic growth and financial development of the organization aimed at leveling the playing field for scientists.
